entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
